# Xenonid Tactical Map Icons This guide will explain what each icon, and Xenonid icon colors mean for Xenonids.
## Xenonid Icon Color Every Xenonid got their own respective map icon, each having a specific color. - [color=Green][bold]Green[/bold][/color] is given to Tier 0 and Tier 1 Xenonids. - [color=Yellow][bold]Yellow[/bold][/color] is given to Tier 2 Xenoninds. - [color=Red][bold]Red[/bold][/color] is given to Tier 3 Xenonids.
## Xenonid Icons - [bold]Lesser[/bold] place holder icon ## Structure Icons
